item.description:
Hello Masterminds!

We'll be holding a Meet up this Friday from 12-1 at the Crowne Plaza Hotel in Danvers.

You'll find us in the business center, just beyond the front lobby.

This week, in honor of Bob Burg, visiting us at the end of the month, we'll be discussing his
book, "The Go-Giver." A Little Story About a Powerful Business Idea.

If you have the book, please review what Bob and John call the 5 Stratospheric Laws of Success.

We'll begin our discussion around those laws.

Looking forward to see you then!

If you have any questions, please feel free to ask.

Be well,

~ Lauren
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the business center to the right, just after the front lobby.

group.name: Think and Grow Rich MasterMind Study Group

item.name: Think and Grow Abundant MasterMind Study Group
